attributes.action: Repair potholes in the roads in Essex
attributes.additional_details: The state of the roads in Essex is disgraceful and is wrecking peoples vehicles and making it dangerous for cyclists
attributes.background: Make local councils repair the roads to a reasonable standard

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local road maintenance are a matter for the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
